Title: #95 5 Ways to Connect with Your Students Over the Summer
Description:
Connie Hamilton @conniehamilton gives us five ways to connect with our students over the summer. We can start next year ahead by picking one or more of these ideas.

Read the show notes at www.coolcatteacher.com/e95 about 5 hours after this show goes live on iTunes.

Listen to the rest of the shows at www.coolcatteacher.com/podcast.
